scripts.publish:jscommon: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @wolforest/jscommon publish --access public && npm run tag:latest
scripts.publish:jscommon:beta: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @wolforest/jscommon publish --tag beta && npm run tag:beta
scripts.tag:latest: cd packages/core && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release latest version" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.tag:beta: cd packages/core && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release beta version" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
